harmonic_ratio.description: Harmonic ratio index (0–10000, pad 5): 0 = fully inharmonic, 10000 = perfectly harmonic. Zero-padded.

partials_count.description: Number of partials/overtones (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = none, 1000 = dense. Zero-padded.

odd_even.description: Odd/Even partials balance (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = all even, 1000 = all odd, 500 = even mix. Zero-padded.

description: HAR (prefix), harmonic ratio (5 digits), partials count (4 digits), odd/even (4 digits); all zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: HAR0950003610150 = ratio 9500, 0361 partials, 0150 odd/even.
